title: Welcome to our website
description: This is a multilingual website built with Next.js

hero.subheading: A flexible, open-source, secure File Uploader that works the way your users expect

live.subTitle: Try our file uploader right in your browser! Test features like resumable uploads, integrity verification, and error handling.
live.dragFiles: Drag files here or click to browse
live.demoLimit: Demo allows you to upload files up to 512MB, but no more than 1 Gb
live.chunkChecksumInfoPopup: Integrity Check to S3 Compatible storage is accessible only for MD5. For 'None' Integrity Check against S3 Storage won't take place.
live.fileChecksumInfoPopup: If you want to check integrity yourself, you can choose appropriate algorithm.
live.warning: It's a demo!  Files are not permanently stored and automatically deleted an hour after uploading.

feature_1.title: Integrity Check
feature_1.description: Advanced file verification ensures data integrity throughout the upload process with MD5, SHA1, SHA256, CRC32, and CRC32C support.

feature_2.title: Large Files Upload
feature_2.description: Handle massive files with ease. Our chunked upload system efficiently manages files of any size while maintaining performance.

feature_3.title: S3 Compatible Upload
feature_3.description: Seamlessly integrate with any S3-compatible storage service. Direct uploads with pre-signed URLs for enhanced security.

feature_4.title: Simple Integration
feature_4.description: Get started fast with our uploader. Comprehensive documentation and examples for quick implementation.

feature_5.title: Single & Bulk Upload
feature_5.description: Flexible upload options for both single files and multiple files simultaneously. Drag and drop support with progress tracking for each file.

feature_6.title: Resumable Upload
feature_6.description: Never lose progress. Automatically resume interrupted uploads from where they left off, saving time and bandwidth.

footer.description: A resumable, S3-compatible solution for handling large file uploads with integrity verification
